title: Tanru Place Structure
goal: Understand that tanru inherit place structure from the rightmost word.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Tanru review:

blue dog → ?
red cat → ?
yellow apple → ?

(Answers: blanu gerku, xunre mlatu, pelxu plise)

New Material (5-7 min)

New Vocabulary

Lojban Place Structure English
crino x1 is green green
xekri x1 is black black
blabi x1 is white white

Tanru Place Structure Rule

The rightmost word determines the place structure.

Consider klama:

klama — x1 goes to x2 from x3 via x4 using x5

Now consider sutra klama (fast-go / go quickly):

sutra klama — x1 fast-goes to x2 from x3 via x4 using x5

The places are identical to klama because klama is rightmost.

Examples

mi sutra klama la .paris.

I go to Paris quickly. (x1=mi, x2=la .paris.)

la gerku cu barda citka la plise

The dog big-eats the apple. (The dog eats the apple in a big way / eats a lot.) Places come from citka: x1=eater, x2=food.

With Color Tanru

mi nelci la blanu gerku

I like the blue dog.

  • Places come from gerku (x1 is a dog of breed x2)
  • blanu just modifies what kind of dog

Key Point

Always look to the rightmost word to determine what places a tanru has.
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Identify Places

What are the places of each tanru?

  1. crino zdani (green house) — places from ?
  2. sutra bajra (fast run) — places from ?
  3. xekri mlatu (black cat) — places from ?
Answers
  1. From zdani: x1 is a nest/house for x2
  2. From bajra: x1 runs on surface x2 using limbs x3 with gait x4
  3. From mlatu: x1 is a cat of species/breed x2

Exercise 2: Translate with Tanru

  1. I go to Paris quickly. (fast-go)
  2. Bob runs fast. (fast-run)
  3. The white dog sleeps. (white dog)
Answers
  1. mi sutra klama la .paris.
  2. la .bob. cu sutra bajra
  3. la blabi gerku cu sipna

Exercise 3: Use New Colors

Translate:

  1. This is a green apple.
  2. That is a black cat.
  3. I see a white house.
Answers
  1. ti crino plise
  2. ta xekri mlatu
  3. mi viska la blabi zdani

items.answer: From `zdani`: x1 is a nest/house for x2
From `bajra`: x1 runs on surface x2 using limbs x3 with gait x4
From `mlatu`: x1 is a cat of species/breed x2

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "I go quickly." → mi sutra klama
  2. "This is a green house." → ti crino zdani
  3. "The black cat sleeps." → la xekri mlatu cu sipna

Today's Vocab

Lojban Place Structure English
crino x1 is green green
xekri x1 is black black
blabi x1 is white white

Summary

You learned that tanru place structure comes from the rightmost word. sutra klama has klama's five places; blanu gerku has gerku's places.
